discourse_list.title: "The Endgame Breakdown with LongForWisdom" - The Raphael, Schuppi, & ElPro MakerDAO Happy Hour

content.content: Not Financial Advice This Content is for entertainment and informational purposes only, you should not construe any such information or other material as legal, tax, investment, financial, or other advice. Nothing contained on the FlipFlopFlap YouTube Channel constitutes a solicitation, recommendation, endorsement, or offer by @LongForWisdom @ultraschuppi @ElProgreso @rspa Flip Flop Flap Delegate LLC, Flipside Crypto or any third party service provider to buy or sell any cryptocurrencies, securities, or other financial instruments. Nothing in this YouTube Video constitutes professional and/or financial advice.  Return of the Jedi @LongForWisdom is one of the most respected MakerDAO community members this community has ever known. His relentless dedication to governing the protocol via the facilitation of scientific governance has paved the way for future generations of Great Facilitators, as well as community members who will build-upon LFW’s vision for the resilience of this new governance paradigm.  If you had difficulty understanding the Endgame, we hope this is the episode for you! In this Episode LFW joins @rspa @ultraschuppi and I to discuss his attempt at interpreting the Endgame Plan via LFWs Forum Post titled “Endgame V3 Summary (LOD2)”, and his op-ed titled, “LFWs Endgame Commentary”. We hope you enjoy watching and listening to this breakdown of the Endgame Plan as much as we did, as LongForWisdom discusses both the upside and the downsides of the Endgame.  The Happy Hour Tastings  🇺🇸    LongForWisdom: Faucet Water from the South of England   3-Stars    Raphael: Water from the City of Boston, Massachusetts, United States   2.5-Stars    Schuppi: Carlsberg Pilsner, Denmark   2-Stars   ElPro: Chocolate Stout Nitro from Browar Stu Mostów, Wrocław Poland   3.5 Stars      Reference for Councils, Tribunals, Scopes, and Clustering Wednesday, 14-09-2022 Open DVC Meeting: “Transition & Implementation”
content.GPT-summary: The post is a YouTube video description of a discussion about the Endgame Plan of MakerDAO. The video features LongForWisdom, who is a respected member of the MakerDAO community, and other participants. The discussion includes LongForWisdom's interpretation of the Endgame Plan and his commentary on it. The post also includes a reference to an upcoming meeting about "Transition & Implementation" and a list of beverages tasted during the discussion.
GPT-discussion-categories: None of the topics listed match.
